manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dell Optical Mouse Overview The Dell Optical Mouse – MS116 features optical LED tracking and wired connectivity providing a stellar performance day after day. Improve your productivity at the office or at home–the Dell Optical Mouse will help keep you on task with accurate 1000 DPI optical tracking. Reliable performance day after day The Dell Optical Mouse – MS116 features optical LED tracking and wired connectivity providing a stellar performance day after day. Improve your productivity at the office or at home–the Dell Optical Mouse will help keep you on task with accurate 1000 DPI optical tracking. Comfort that lasts Designed for comfortable use over extended periods of time, the Dell Optical Mouse is your desktop partner. Shaped and sized to fit the contours of your hand with 2 buttons and a scroll wheel, the Dell Optical Mouse makes it easy to navigate through on–screen projects.

Compatible with practically any system The Dell Optical Mouse is compatible with almost any system that has a USB port. Use one mouse in the office and keep another at home. Plug and play convenience Simply plug the Dell Optical Mouse into any available USB port and get to work–it's that easy. At home or in the office The Dell Optical Mouse is the perfect choice for either home or office use–wherever reliability, comfort and convenience are objectives.
Contemporary aesthetic With a contemporary design aesthetic, the Dell Optical Mouse–MS116 seamlessly fits into any desktop environment. What's in the Box: Dell Optical Mouse–MS116
Device Type Mouse Connectivity Technology Wired - USB Color Black Weight 14.57 oz Movement Detection Technology Optical Movement Resolution 1000 dpi Cable Length 6 ft Device Type Mouse
Weight 14.57 oz Color Black Connectivity Technology Wired Interface USB Movement Detection Technology Optical Movement Resolution 1000 dpi Cable Length 6 ft Interfaces 1 x USB

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value Mouse
reviews.reviewText: The mouse that I’d had for years shattered on a tile floor and so I ordered this one with next day shipping. It was a great value and works great. Smooth tracking and has worked really well so far. Comfortable to use as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My work had provided one of these to me back around 2010 and I've been ordering this mouse for my various machines since -- 14 years in, I've only had one fail and have had around a handful, including wireless ones. This is the best mouse out there for normal use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheap and cheerful replacement.
reviews.reviewText: It's a cheap mouse but it does the job and for my medium to large male hands it fits just fine. Not as heavy as the old Logitech it has replaced but for the money, you can't beat it with a stick. Works great and has a wheel for scrolling. Very responsive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good product, comfortable and easy to use, plug it in and use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It does what a mouse is supposed to
reviews.reviewText: Just plug into a USB port on my dell or hp laptop and it works. No batteries needed it has a cord so just plug and go. Works like a champ.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite mouse
reviews.reviewText: I needed to replace a broken mouse for my home computer. The one that I used to have doesn't seem to be available any longer.I was looking for an inexpensive basic 3-button wired mouse that is comfortable to use all day long. I like big mice, to put all my hand on in a relaxed position, and not have to clutch it. After trying out several different ones, which were adequate but still not what I was looking for, I got myself the same mouse that is provided for me in my office, and I love it.It is reasonably large - well, at least it is hard to find a larger one which also has other features I was looking for. It is simple not only in the sense of being a 3-button no-frills wired mouse, but also in the design made of straight parallel lines with a round wheel and a low profile. It doesn't make claims of being ergonomic, but it is very comfortable for my hand, placing all the fingers where they are supposed to be, and I easily move it with just my fingers, leaving my wrist rest on the desk, just the way I like it. It doesn't make claims of being noiseless, but it is reasonably quiet - not completely silent, but providing a relatively low clicking feedback sound that doesn't bother me at all. It works well without a mouse pad, so I don't need to clutter my precious desk real estate with it. Haven't experienced any problems with this mouse at home or in the office, it just works.This one is a keeper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's a basic mouse but it has worked extremely well. It's very responsive and the accuracy is high.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not big enough, but it's a great little mouse.
reviews.reviewText: The middle button clicks decisively. no other mouse did that.
I used this product multiple times and it worked always perfectly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Replaced a older version. Decent quality. Good price
I'm using this mouse on my Android device since few months. Cable quality is fine. Liked the design most, so simple.
Plug and play mouse did exactly that. Works perfectly. I am very happy.
Mouse básico, como reemplazo de uno similar, buen producto, simplemente lo esperado por el precio.
